projects.title: AWS Secure Architecture
projects.bodyText: In this project, I architected a secure, multi-tiered AWS environment, aligning with AWS security best practices to manage traffic flow â€” routing inbound through AWS WAF and outbound via AWS Network Firewall, ensuring a secure, scalable production setup.
